channel.title: Teaching on Joel Mackenzie
channel.description: Recent content in Teaching on Joel Mackenzie

item.title: Teaching
item.description: The University of Queensland I am the course coordinator and lecturer for DATA7001: Introduction to Data Science with Dr Xin Guo during semester 1, 2023, and for COMP3506: Algorithms & Data Structures during semester 2, 2023. I was the course coordinator and lecturer for INFS3200: Advanced Database Systems at the University of Queensland during Semester 2, 2022. RMIT University I have previously been a tutor and/or a lab assistant for the following courses at RMIT University:
